trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> to stop executing and returns control back to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref> para parar a execução e devolve controlo novamente para o método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The Halt action is similar to a break command, although it ends the execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.
trans-unit.target: A ação Halt é semelhante a um comando de quebra, embora que termina a execução de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: The Halt action will stop execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> when all the actions in the same action block have finished executing.
trans-unit.target: A ação Halt irá parar a execução do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>quando todas as ações no mesmo bloco ação terminar de executar.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> que é idêntica a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as duas instâncias de objeto são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>A comparar com a atual <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> contexto utilizado para executar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: context is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: contexté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os campos e propriedades atualizadas pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerir o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de campos e propriedades alteradas pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Since <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> does not have parameters, the return value will always be an empty list.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"> </xref> não tem parâmetros, o será de valor de retorno sempre de ser uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: Devolve a cadeia "Pare".

trans-unit.source: The string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia "Halt".

trans-unit.source: Returns true, no validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve true, nenhuma validação é efetuada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerir o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
